attributes.action: The government to knight Captain Tom Moore for raising up to today £6 million.
attributes.additional_details: Because it is time people like this gentleman should get the recognition that they deserve.
attributes.background: What this gentleman has achieved at the age of 99 years is phenomenal. He has to date raised over £6million pounds by walking laps of his garden. He is an inspiration to all and yet is so down to earth at what he has done. He should be knighted by the government for his achievement.

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
